ISSUE.TITLE: Interface Bulk Edit requires interface "type"
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Deployment Type Self-hosted ### NetBox Version v4.2.8 ### Python Version 3.11 ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Go to DCIM > Interfaces 2. Select multiple interfaces 3. Edit the interfaces 4. Enter in something for "Label" but leave other fields empty ### Expected Behavior Interface(s) are edited properly ### Observed Behavior Interface Edit page "jumps" to the "label" field

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixes: #19275 - Make type choice for interfaces non-required
